description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed the issue where content could not be searched from the CurseForge source.  
2. Fixed the freezing issue when exiting the game using the Boat backend version 1.21.9+.  
3. Fixed the incorrect UI display of the automatic memory allocation option on the game settings page.  
4. Fixed the issue where automatic memory allocation did not take effect.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复CurseForge源无法搜索到内容的问题
2.修复Boat后端1.21.9+点击退出游戏后卡死的问题
3.修复游戏设置页面自动内存分配UI显示错误的问题
4.修复自动内存分配不生效的问题
